attributes.value: Respects the law
Greatly prizes loyalty
Values family
Finds herself somewhat disgusted with eloquent speakers
Is greatly disturbed by quiet and a peaceful existence
Respects commerce
Believes war is preferable to peace in general
Desires little for herself in the way of possessions
Is very impolite and inconsiderate of propriety
Has a tendency to go it alone, without considering the advice of others
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Could not care less about her appearance, talents or other personal vanities
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Is sometimes cruel
Tries to do things correctly each time
Is intellectually stubborn, rarely changing her mind during a debate regardless of the merits
Does not generally respond to emotional appeals
Is sloppy with her living space
Is interested only in facts and the real world
Weak
Rarely sick
Good creativity
An iffy memory
A great musical sense
A meager kinesthetic sense
